mapper.sql: transaction_id, time_stamp, type, payer, payer_name, status, gross_amt, fee_amt, net_amt, version, created_by, created_on, updated_by, updated_on, delete_ind
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from transaction
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into transaction (transaction_id, time_stamp, type, payer, payer_name, status, gross_amt, fee_amt, net_amt, version, created_by, created_on, updated_by, updated_on, delete_ind ) values (#{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteInd,jdbcType=CHAR} )

update transaction

update transaction
time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payer = #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payer_name = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gross_amt = #{grossAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee_amt = #{feeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
